column6: Dust settles over the rubble of Tokyo. What emerges, for better or worse, will define the next generation of mutantkind. PLUS, as the survivors return to Utopia, there is a reckoning between Wolverine and Teon. One way or the other, it's another unforgettable issue of Generation Hope.
column8: | penciller (cover):Olivier Coipel | penciller:Salvador Espin | writer:Kieron Gillen | editor:Nick Lowe
